scripts.deploy:web: cd web && npm run build && (where vercel >nul 2>nul && vercel --prod || echo "vercel CLI not installed - skipped")
scripts.deploy:backend: python -m compileall backend/fastapi && cd ..\TaskUPv1 && python -m compileall . && git add . && git commit -m "chore: deploy backend" || echo "no backend changes to commit" && git push || echo "git push skipped"
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:web && npm run deploy:backend
